name: Alpha Corporation
overview:
Established in the year 1995, at Ludhiana (Punjab, India), we, “Alpha Corporation”, are highly recognized as exporters and suppliers of an exclusive range of Bed Spreads, Throws and Shawls. We have started our journey as a small firm but since then we have emerged as the strongest and trusted organization in the domain.

Infrastructure: Our In-house facilities: A team of experienced supervisory and QC personnel manage our factory. Well equipped with the latest machinery of the top brands. We have in house design studio, which constantly works on design and product development. We are committed to utmost customer satisfaction through our quality services.

Our Team: Backed by the efficient and experienced professionals, we are highly engaged in offering an outstanding range of Bed Spreads, Throws and Shawls. Our meticulous team strives hard by working in close coordination to uphold and deliver perfect products to the clients.

Client Satisfaction: We provide our entire product range in various customized options as per customer requirements. Also, we understand the expectations of the customers and provide products with unquestionable quality to our customers with in a given time frame.
